issue.title: [Rust] Arrow crate does not specify arrow-flight version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8535](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8535). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Arrow Cargo.toml has:
```java

arrow-flight = { path = "../arrow-flight", optional = true } 
```
It should be:
```java

arrow-flight = { path = "../arrow-flight", optional = true, version = "1.0.0-SNAPSHOT" } 
```
Also need to update release scripts to replace this version.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8535?focusedCommentId=17152042) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7591
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7591>
